statements: SELECT * FROM customer_reviews;
SELECT customer_name, rating, review_text FROM customer_reviews WHERE product_id = 123;
SELECT review_id, customer_name, rating, review_date FROM customer_reviews ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM customer_reviews GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(review_id) AS total_reviews FROM customer_reviews GROUP BY customer_name HAVING COUNT(review_id) > 3;
SELECT * FROM customer_reviews WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY review_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, rating FROM customer_reviews WHERE product_id = 100 ORDER BY rating DESC, review_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, review_text FROM customer_reviews WHERE review_text LIKE '%awesome%' OR review_text LIKE '%excellent%';
SELECT product_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM customer_reviews GROUP BY product_id HAVING AVG(rating) > 3 ORDER BY avg_rating DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT product_id FROM customer_reviews WHERE review_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM CustomerReviews WHERE rating >= 4.0;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, review_text FROM CustomerReviews WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT review_text, rating FROM CustomerReviews WHERE product_id = 5001 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM ProductRecommendations;
SELECT product_id, recommended_product_id FROM ProductRecommendations WHERE product_id = 2002;
SELECT * FROM CustomerReviews WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY review_id DESC
SELECT product_id, COUNT(review_id) AS total_reviews FROM CustomerReviews GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_reviews > 5
SELECT product_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM CustomerReviews GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY avg_rating DESC
SELECT review_text FROM CustomerReviews WHERE customer_id = 1234 AND rating BETWEEN 3.5 AND 4.5
SELECT c.*, p.recommended_product_id FROM CustomerReviews c INNER JOIN ProductRecommendations p ON c.product_id = p.product_id
SELECT * FROM customer_reviews;
SELECT review_id, customer_id, rating FROM customer_reviews;
SELECT customer_id, review_text FROM customer_reviews WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price < 100.00;
SELECT * FROM customer_reviews WHERE rating > 4
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics'
SELECT review_text FROM customer_reviews WHERE customer_id = 123
SELECT customer_name, email, product_name, price FROM customers c JOIN customer_reviews cr ON c.customer_id = cr.customer_id JOIN products p ON cr.product_id = p.product_id
SELECT * FROM reviews;
SELECT product_id, customer_id, rating FROM reviews WHERE rating >= 4.0;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price < 50.00 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE registration_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM reviews WHERE product_id = 1 AND rating > 4 ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01' AND registration_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT product_name, manufacturer, price FROM products WHERE manufacturer = 'Apple' OR manufacturer = 'Samsung' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT recommendation_id, product_id, customer_id, recommended_product_id FROM recommendations WHERE customer_id = 10 AND recommendation_date >= '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, brand, category FROM Product ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customer WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customer WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customer WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT product_name, brand, category FROM Product WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, review_text, rating FROM Customer JOIN Review ON Customer.customer_id = Review.customer_id WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT product_name, average_rating, num_reviews FROM Product JOIN Rating ON Product.product_id = Rating.product_id WHERE brand = 'Apple';
